text: Edward Wolfe Moeller (January 8, 1919 – November 7, 2018) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Youngstown Bears and Tri-Cities Blackhawks during the 1946–47 season and averaged 1.8 points per game. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Basketball players from Ohio Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Ohio State Buckeyes men's basketball players Category:People from Delaware, Ohio Category:Tri- Cities Blackhawks players Category:Youngstown Bears players
title: Ed Moeller
